faq.heading: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Clear your doubts about how we can help your business with customized technology solutions.

items.question: How can Stratus help my company?
items.answer: Stratus offers customized backend solutions, integrations, and automations to optimize your internal processes, improve communication between systems, and increase operational efficiency. Our services are tailored to your company's specific needs, regardless of size or sector.

items.question: How long does it take to develop a custom solution?
items.answer: Development time varies according to project complexity. Simple integrations may take a few weeks, while more complex systems may require several months. We work with agile methodologies that allow incremental deliveries, ensuring you see results throughout the development process.

items.question: Do you work with legacy systems?
items.answer: Yes, we have extensive experience in integrating and modernizing legacy systems. We understand the challenges of connecting old technologies with modern solutions and develop approaches that preserve your investment while implementing progressive improvements.

items.question: How does the consulting process work?
items.answer: Our consulting begins with a detailed analysis of your current scenario, identifying challenges and opportunities. Next, we develop a strategic plan with technical and business recommendations. We can act only as consultants or also implement the recommended solutions, according to your preference.

items.question: Does Stratus offer support after implementation?
items.answer: Yes, we offer different levels of post-implementation support, from basic monitoring and maintenance to 24/7 support for critical systems. Our goal is to ensure that implemented solutions continue to function perfectly and evolve according to your needs.

items.question: How does Stratus implement Artificial Intelligence projects?
items.answer: We implement AI in a practical and results-oriented way, from intelligent automations to data analysis and predictions. We focus on use cases that bring real value to the business, integrating AI technologies with your existing systems and ensuring solutions are scalable and sustainable.

cta.text: Didn't find what you were looking for? Contact us directly.

contact.heading: Let's
contact.description: We're ready to discuss your project and how we can help turn your ideas into reality.
